basics.name: Dhanya Simon
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary:
Passionate Software engineer with a strong desire to tackle challenges using a variety of techniques and technologies. A logical and creative thinker who enjoys learning new languages, frameworks and technologies in general. Equipped with a diverse and promosing skill set. The satisfaction of solving problems is what drives me to be a bettter programmer. 

 I have **3+ years** of software engineering expertise, proficient in an assortment of technologies including .Net, ASP.Net, Web development, C#, Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and SQL. Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects as well as collaborate in a team setting.

courses: Master's in Computer Science and Engineering
Bachelor's in Computer Science and Engineering

work.name: Remote
work.summary: Worked with various clients across various websites. Helped to achieve a consistent look and visual theme across various websites by promoting uniform fonts, formatting, images and layout. Planned, developed, tested, deployed and maintained web applications. I could work well independently as well as in a team setting.

work.name: uTest.com
work.summary: As a uTester, successfully identified, diagnosed and reported various bugs with detailed bug reports both exploratory and using test cases, including functional bugs like broken links, visual bugs and formatting issues.

work.name: ILM College of Engineering and Technology, Kerala, India
work.summary: As Web Developer, I was responsible for developing and maintaining the college website using ASP.Net. As an Assistant Professor, my reponsibility was preparing study materials, delivering lectures, assessing student performance and also guiding students on Computer Programming lab experiments as well as academic projects.

projects.name: Dotnet-Helpers
projects.description: Utilities and helper classes for faster .Net development by writing less code.

projects.name: Orchestration
projects.description: .Net library to orchestrate operations and commands. Helps to follow Single Responsibility Pattern.

projects.name: Karel
projects.description: Javascript based Karel simulator to learn programming easily. It simplifies programming to a level of just controlling a robot using a fixed set of instructions.
